Mar 04 by Vortex

Come meet us in sunny Barcelona

At Vortex we are very excited to be part of the year’s greatest wind energy event: EWEA 2014, especially as it is being held in our home town! We are looking forward to hosting you next week at our largest Booth ever (# 6E10), with a couple of surprises. We would also like to invite you to the first Vortex user’s Party on Tuesday, which will be a great opportunity to get together for a chat. Finally, we will be pleased to meet you on Wednesday and Thursday Conference sessions, where some of our latest research and innovation effort will be unveiled.

Get the vibe of Barcelona’s night-life at the first Vortex user’s Party in Café Royale.

Abel Tortosa, Gil Lizcano and Pep Moreno to speak at the Ressource Assesment track, Wed. 11h & Thu. 9h.

The image is a detail of Barcelona 2005, Josep Moscardó’s paint
